doc:
Peter Gallagher https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Gallagher 0 Peter Killian Gallagher (born August 19, 1955) is an American actor, musician and writer. Since 1980, Gallagher has played roles in numerous Hollywood films. He is best known for starring as Sandy Cohen in the television drama series The O.C. from 2003 to 2007, and a recurring role as Deputy Chief William Dodds on Law Order: Special Victims Unit. Peter_Killian_Gallagher ( born August_19_,_1955 ) is an_American_actor , musician_and_writer . Since 1980 , Gallagher has_played roles in numerous_Hollywood_films . He is_best_known for starring as Sandy_Cohen in the_television_drama series The_O.C. from 2003 to 2007 , and a_recurring_role as Deputy_Chief_William_Dodds on Law_ : Special_Victims_Unit .
